resources.string: Select a role for this device

As the Actor you will be given the choice between 5 different phrases. Once you select a phrase you will then choose a word from the phrase to act out. You will be asked to select a new word from the phrase if it guessed correctly or the time for the round expires. The round ends when the whole phrase has been guessed or the time has expired.

As the Viewer you will be shown the topic of the phrase, current word in the phrase, number of letters in the phrase and the time remaining until the word is revealed. You must attempt to guess the word being acted by looking at the hologram in front of you. The fast you guess, the more points you get!
Please wait for the game to begin...
